page.title: 15WILDLIFE IN REDDISH VALE
page.content: When you arrive at{Reddish Vale}you can have a look in the{Reddish Vale {visitor centre.}There you can see some skulls from real{badgers}that have died but you are not likely to find any badgers in{Reddish Vale}because they are very rare. You can ask{Dave {Cannon}the{warden}some questions on {wildlife. { Dave}will tell you about all the rabbits that burrow under the twigs that the wardens have cut from the trees. In the future there will be some changes in{Reddish Vale}because in the farm there is a family of hamsters breeding rapidly and they are all escaping and running off into the woods.These pet hampsters will become wild in the future and live and breed in the{Vale.}
